name: node-media-capture-api
description: Node.js implementation of Media Capture API and MediaStream Recording API.

scripts.clean: npm run clean-src && npm run clean-test
scripts.release-build: npm run clean-browser && npm run release-bundle && npm run minify
scripts.transpile: npm run transpile-test && npm run transpile-samples && npm run transpile-src
scripts.transpile-src: npm run clean-src && babel src/ --out-dir transpiled/src/
scripts.transpile-test: npm run clean-test && babel test/ --out-dir transpiled/test/
scripts.transpile-samples: npm run clean-samples && babel samples/ --out-dir transpiled/samples/
scripts.test: npm run build-native && npm run lint && npm run transpile && mocha transpiled/test/spec/**/*.js
scripts.start: npm run build-native && npm run lint && npm run transpile && npm run copy && node transpiled/samples/server/index.js

author: Kuu Miyazaki
